name: Drone Invasion
description:
This is our game for the Ludum Dare 40. Fly through the space with a spaceship and try to get as far as possible. But beware ! You are not alone there. There are comets everywhere and dangerous alien drones. They will try to destroy your ship ! But they don't like the comets too 

How to play:

Try to survive!
Aliens will try to destroy your spaceship!
Throw them off by colliding with meteorites.
avoid frontal collisions!
